title: How do I file a compalint dealing with a railroad crossing?  I think the Railroad system is Stillwater Central.  They blocked my right of way for 45 minutes.  I called the Department of Transportation in Okahoma at 521-3407 and talked with Sherry (spelling)?  She told me that the train shouldn\'t be sitting still for longer than 20 minutes.  After about 25 minutes the train did move back and forth a little.
